title: FP Head Pro
content:
Dear Customers, Fans, Visitors:

Fontpartners.com are now going to present the update of our typefamily FP Head:  
A Pro Extended Latin version: 5 weights + Italics, 530 characters in each, all in Opentype format, of course.

FP Head Pro is a broad headline font, with a blur-style architecture.  
The typeface has a touch of FF Max, hard and soft at the same time.

1 weight: 50 Euro  
1 package: 185 Euro (Contains: Light, Book, Medium, Bold, Black)

Please have a look at our PR-movie on Facebook:

[http://www.facebook.com/pages/Fontpartnerscom/33187212502](http://web.archive.org/web/20140807045756/http:/www.facebook.com/pages/Fontpartnerscom/33187212502 "http://www.facebook.com/pages/Fontpartnerscom/33187212502")

Hope you like the family!

Sincerely,  
Morten Rostgaard Olsen  
Ole Søndergaard

[www.fontpartners.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20140807045756/http:/www.fontpartners.com/ "www.fontpartners.com")
author: morten
